divs: Sighting DetailsI was a reluctant convert to believing that something might really be going on with some of the reports I've read on this site. I'm a rationalist and naturally skeptical. I agree with Einstein, for example, when he said the Bible is nothing but a bunch of childish stories. However, every now and then I read something like the woman who submitted the report below, and I wonder how many others like her have stopped taking their meds. I feel sorry for her, but there must be some other site where she post can such paranoid rubbish. A plea to other nuts--stay off this site. Serious reports only.
Summary: Response to "VIDEO OF ORB AND FLASHING MULTICOLOR TRIANGLES IN BEDROOM"
trends: there has been one other sighting in cms\tg
there were no other sightings in cms\tg on or around
